description:
Section 73 application to vary Condition 2 (Drawing and Document Numbers) and Condition 3 (Materials (Details)) of planning permission ref: P2019/0442/FUL, dated:10/12/2019, for: Provision of additional office space (use class B1) through the erection of a replacement mansard roof to Nos. 20 and 21, the rear extension of Nos. 19, 20 and 21 with a part one, part two storey rear extension, reinstatement of 'butterfly' roof at 4th floor level to No.19 with a modern extension to the rear, the provision of 17 no. photovoltaic panels and a biodiverse roof at first floor roof level at the rear, historic reinstatements including replacement windows to No. 19, and Nos. 20 & 21 with altered fenestrations to the 3rd floor dormers and second floor windows to Nos.20 and 21, excavation works for extensions at basement level (Alterations to planning permission ref. P2017/2089/FUL).' The variation of Condition 2 seeks to amend the previous permission to include:
1. Parapet height to NW & SW facade of new extension and SW rear brick facade of No.19 increased by 105mm. Parapet height to new 4th floor rear extension increased by 60mm
2. NW façade line to 2nd & 3rd floor of rear extension moved out by 200mm.
3. Lift overrun height increased by approximately 540mm.
4. Party wall line adjusted slightly.
5. Changes to the façade composition and fenestration.
6. The angle of the dividing parapet wall to the proposed mansard roof is proposed to be amended to be perpendicular to the façade.
7. Concrete band to façade at basement level has been increased in height..
8. Other changes (due to Building Regulations/health and safety requirements):
a) Roof level latchway system to allow safe access for maintenance.
b) Ventilation grill added to bin store.
c) Dry riser cabinet added to front elevation for firefighting purposes.
d) Sliding folding door added to terrace to provide another means of fire escape.
e) Existing fire escape door replaced with fixed louvered panel of same size a
decision_conditions:
CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 10/12/2022 being the expiry date of the original extant permission ref: P2019/0442/FUL.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
